post.body: Thanks honey - Tomorrow should be okay,I hope. The 'own bed' thing tho is DIVINE, working on making that happen allthe time
Oh honey. There is not one thing wrong with the internet that a good coat of fire can't cure. Fire it up & lets be done with it.
Suz's dad made her first curtain/sheet/blanket set for her nursery & she still (at 6) sleeps w/ the blanket (called scrumpy)
Also, I will send very, very ugly thoughts to yours for not taking spiders seriously b/c: OMG SPIDERS!11!! Hate hate hate HATE
Honestly the only thing saving his sorry laughing ass is that he's 2000 miles away. But he has to come home. Eventually.
Is pretty, good job!
Thanks hon. I will be feeling better tomorrow am sure. But am at a loss for scheduling now. It will work out. Has to, right.
wrangle these um..energetic kids. Especially the boys. Did I mention the boys? B/c YEAH they are a dozen handfuls on my BEST days ha!
Aww, it's, well. I won't say 'no big deal' b/c it IS but it's super treatable More than anything, I just need another set of hands to
1st time I saw a moose was in the north-east They think the sound of jake (engine) brakes are mating calls. True (scary)story.
Yes maam, little bit of stage 2 ovarian cancer. Nothing we can't whack with a stick but bummer right now b/c chemo sucks pretty hard!
Did that Twitter make my butt look big? Wanting to make a good impression and all.
Hello Director of Advantage Testing!!
Newark is Jersey but close enough to be NY, for real, yo
Am doing the ugly cry already just reading this part...xoxox Am so, so sorry T.
Naaaaaaaaw, now you know why people CONTINUE drinking
!!!!!!!! I said almost the same thing the other day, ''this baby is kicking the crap out of my bladder'' Hubs was like, HUH??
And no advertising needed, pervs will find the panty sites w/ NO ASSISTANCE if my google referrers mean anything, ha!
to you&has nada to do w/your heritage Your broad brush generalizations are as prejudiced as you continually accuse others of being
If you spent 3 yrs in NC & all you can say about the south is Jewish ppl aren't welcome all I can conclude is that applies solely
D thought it would be in poor taste. Prude.
I wanted reeallyy badly to send one this year that was all, ''broken bones, broken homes, rehab, cancer & nutty kids!! YAY US!!''
@thordora @jodifur Thanks you guys, we appreciate it.
Thanks, I appreciate it muchly.
Good lord, how bout right when they eat a bag of syphilitic dicks? Would that be a good time? Assholes assholes everywhere.
Oh hells yeah - I haven't answered ANY of their calls and won't. They know this and yet...ring ring ring. Some fools nevah learn.
2 of his sisters particularly (both of whom believe I 'stole' my sister's kids) keeeeep calling and I'm just like...srsly? Eff off.
My dad is in the hospital, on a vent. P-monia, internal bleeding. Merry effing Holidayz!!
like a woman her age - Hated that w/ all the pageantry of the movie they kinda ripped her off.
The most ridic thing about that movie is that Candy Bergen looks like an elderly line-backer yet on Boston Legal she just looks
any time in the south, which makes you exactly as provincial as you accuse the author of being.
Way to stay on topic by taking a shot at the South/Jewish people - Very hypocritical for you to say as you have obv never spent
Unless it's a crazy link, spam heavy comment I leave em alone Errybody trying to make a dollah, esp now.
Only word in that I really caught is Ativan - I hope she's better soon and that a lengua is a ....good? thing.
Holy naked avatar pic! Isn't it past your bedtime, young man?
HAPPPPPPPPPPY BIRTHDAY BABE!!!!
My husband had an affair. We made it through. Wasn't easy but was very, very worth it.
I will need a diagram, some pictures and some more hints to figure this one out.
Oh no - I hope she feels better soon. Panic & anxiety suck.
How you doing? You healing up on the inside along w/ the outside?
Maintaining, babe Is all I can do; tomorrow is chemo then flight cross country w/4kids to bury my dad. Merry Holidays, yeah.
Oh honey. Eff them all up in their a's - srsly Easier said than done but don't let those w/no home training get you down Honestly.
And anything super important or that doesn't get packed, they sell in Vancouver, too! You know me - cheap, easy & efficient!!
Ha I put all the unders/socks etc in baggies & sucked out the air w/vacc All clothes are rolled TIGHT 2bags is ALL I can manage!
Oh honey, no. 10-15 seconds, MAX.
(PS D IS a super great amazing man, honest & he works hard blahblah & we ALL appreciate that but suck my dick if I'm ''lucky'' - Gah.
SRSLY? One of us is here, all.the.time, with 4 kids, cancer, chemo & a house that has..issues. And HE?? is lucky? O RLLY?! Sorry, you suck.
Oh SNAP. So am I being thin-skinned that someone just told me ''You're so lucky to have a great guy like D w/ all that is going on''? B/c
What magic is this? 10pm & everyone is sleeping (in their own beds!1) Chemo tomorrow & husband may even get home by evening time Good stuff.
What the hell happened to Vivica Fox's face? That is a tragedy, simply stated. And also, 650 pairs of shoes?! I have Five. Fiiiive.
And that twitter right there, is what you call tempting fate. When found under a pile of debris w/mice eaten face, you will all know why.
Given last nights occurrences (mice, tornados, escaped prisoner on the loose(!!) & the ensuing hysterics, today has really not been half bad
r/t @craftastrophe In searchof Etsy sellers to gain exposure by allowing us to host a giveaway on our site Apply http://craftastrophe.net/co
320am and everyone is FINALLY asleep again. And the great thing is, another day begins in a whole TWO hours. Tomorrow is going to suck hard.
Srsly, universe. Once they are all in bed resting if not sleeping, no more horrors for at least 8 hrs. Is in the rules. Universe is a prick.
Oh. Hahahaha. Those hysterical kids that are all up in my grill & freaking the eff right out? It's just a TORNADO SIREN, simmah down.
r/t @mamarosa You must set your DVR's to Dr.Phil tomorrow. My friend Stef is going to be on! http://tinyurl.com/6x6py9
Oh for fucks sake. Tomorrow's forecast? SNOW!! Em-effing SNOW. Know why I moved back to Mississippi? NO EFFING SNOW. #*&#SNOW#^##*@@*!!!11!
Free to good (or horrible, I don't honestly care) home: One husband whose reaction to the whole Mice Hysteria was to LAUGH. So done w/ him.
And no, no it wasn't b/c the boys were bad, they were awesome & sweet & better than I ever expected & yet: Don't bring them again. WTF?
3)was told not to bring them again b/c 'bad enviro for kids 4) better to leave them home alone? 5) D not home until Sunday @ earliest - SOB
How this day has sucked ass lemme count the ways 1) chemo sucked, feel like run over by truck 2) no option but to take boys w/ me to appt
gets home to make it tonight or tomorrow. Am starving!! Now off to appt w/ two wild, wild boys. Wish us (and the Dr office) much luck. Ugh.
So. Chemo was delayed until today & I haven't eaten a thing since 7pm last night - Picking up stuff for risotto on the way home & hoping D
Things I never thought I would say #849447, ''NO!! DO!! NOT!! Lick your brother's underwear - S T O P!!!''
Ok so it's not that I don't KNOW that snuggies are essentially backwards robes but still....I want one. This house is chilly.
If Child Services even heard a tape of what goes on here w/these boys (5&2) they would put ALL of us up for adoption Mach 11 Noise Level
Come December 31st, I am SO breaking up with 2008. Finished! Done! No takes backsies!! 2008: Bringing the suck to dramatically new levels!!
brother/son/uncle/whatever and b) b/c I DON'T WANT TO TALK TO YOU ASSHOLES. Ok I srsly need to calm the eff down. Hate being so far away.
If I tell (text) you: Call mom for updates (b/c I'm 3000 MILES AWAY) - Why you want to call me?!! I only sent the text b/c a) he's your
Aaaaaand there is the holiday I expected: My dad is in the hospital, on a vent. P-monia, internal bleeding. Deep breath Deep breath - Exhale
r/t @loadeddice RT @BreakingNewsOn Helix High School in California on lockdown unconfirmed scanner reports say gunman opened fire on campus.
Memorial service for my dad tomorrow Burial not until next week Thanks so much stupid winter storm UGH!!!
Also, I miss my dad.
Hands down worst holiday season ever Worst traveling ever Worst winter storm in Portland/Vancouver ever Oh 2008, we are SO effin done.
Oh people. I am not the one to throw, ''You're never given more than you can handle.'' at, I am srsly & honestly SO NOT THE ONE. Gaaaaah.
Last message from my dad http://tinyurl.com/a7k5e8 So awesome, SO glad I saved it.
I need to find a job as luggage coordinator. 1 adult 4 kids 2wks = 2 carry on bags. That's right. TWO CARRY ON BAGS. Who rules? I DO. Awyeah
VICTORY: One of my aunts who isn't an asshole is meeting us in ATL on our connecting flight. Chaos party of 5 is now Party of 6 - WOO!!
Oh good morning 20 degree weather. We meet again. Want to know how cold a 104yr old house gets when its 20? Effing gee-dee cold, yall. DAMN.
